Package hanabAI

Class Hanabi

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanabAI.Hanabi
  • public class Hanabi
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for running a single game of Hanabi. An array of 2-5 agents is provided, a deal is initialised and players takes turns until the game ends and the score is reported.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hanabi​(Agent[] agents)
      Initilaises the game.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public int play()
        Plays the game. The agents will execute their strategies until the game is complete and a number is returned.
        Returns:
        the score for the game

      • play

        public int play​(java.lang.StringBuffer log)
        Plays the game. The agents will execute their strategies until the game is complete and a number is returned.
        Parameters:
        log - a StringBuffer containing a description of the game
        Returns:
        the score of the game

      • critique

        public static java.lang.String critique​(int score)

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        This main method is provided to run a simple test game with provided agents. The agent implementations should be in the default package.
